name: Worship Feet
descrip: Get an opponent hot and bothered with just your words. Can charm opponents. Is a Foreplay skill.
outcome: {AttackerName} teases {TargetName} with sexual promises, and they flush at the implications.
miss: {AttackerName} teases {TargetName} with sexual promises, but they appear to be unaffected.
statusOutcome: {TargetName}'s mind is filled with sexual fantasies from {AttackerName}'s words. {TargetName} has been charmed!
